original_text: Like the nations that the Lord makes to perish before you, so shall you perish, because you would not obey the voice of the Lord your God.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너희 앞에서 멸망시키신 민족들 같이 너희도 멸망하리니 이는 너희가 너희의 하나님 여호와의 소리를 청종하지 아니함이니라

sentences.original_text: Like the nations that the Lord makes to perish before you,
the voice of the Lord your God.
